content: We are using FHIR extensibly as the domain model and persistence for application development. I have a situation where two separate processes need to 'check-in' in order for a third to proceed. I am looking for a FHIR Resource (or some base type) that I can use to capture the state of a software semaphore.
Task (and Task.businessStatus) might provide what you're looking for
thanks Lloyd. We'll look into it. I guess it makes the most sense
